subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Patrick Kerney had three sacks and an interception to lead the Seahawks past the Rams, 24-19. Kerney, a defensive end, also forced a fumble for the second week in a row.
snippet: Patrick Kerney had three sacks and an interception to lead the Seahawks past the Rams, 24-19. Kerney, a defensive end, also forced a fumble for the second week in a row.
